q_ch: 对于编号为33的裁剪任务，预计任务结束时间需要延迟至2024年7月31日
q_en: The expected completion date for cutting task 33 needs to be extended to July 31, 2024.
gt:
### Cutting Task Update Summary

Hey there! 😄 Here's the update on the cutting task you asked about:

| Task ID | Current End Time       | New End Time       | Update Status          |
|---------|------------------------|--------------------|------------------------|
| 33      | July 17, 2024          | July 31, 2024      | Update successful! 🎉  |

The expected completion date for cutting task 33 has been successfully extended to July 31, 2024. If you have any more questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask! 😊

results.input:
Retrieve the current end time for the cutting task with ID 33
tool_find_cutting_task, {'cutting_task_id': '33'}, Find the cutting task by the cutting task ID
results.output: The current end time for the cutting task with ID 33 is July 17, 2024.

steps.sql: UPDATE cutting_tasks SET end_time = '2024-07-31' WHERE id = 33;
steps.description: Update the end time for the cutting task with ID 33 to July 31, 2024
